job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van implementaties van taalmodellen, zodat deze voldoet aan de behoeften van onze analyse- en productteams.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development and optimization of language model implementations, which falls under the definition of creating or adapting models.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementeren van betrouwbare en efficiënte data pipelines voor de verzameling, opslag, verwerking en analyse van grote hoeveelheden data.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core tasks of data engineering, focusing on pipelines for data collection, storage, processing, and analysis, aligning with the definition of data preparation and management for models.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met Digital Product Teams om technische oplossingen te ontwerpen die gebruikmaken van onze standaard bouwblokken voor de implementatie van nieuwe digitale producten.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves designing technical solutions and implementing new digital products using standard building blocks, which is a core software development and integration activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Bieden van technische ondersteuning en kennisdeling binnen de organisatie om het gebruik van data en technologische tools te bevorderen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions providing technical support and knowledge sharing, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Continu verbeteren van de datakwaliteit en verwerkingsefficiëntie door het implementeren van moderne datatechnologieën en best practices.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on improving data quality and processing efficiency through the implementation of data technologies and best practices, fitting the data engineering and management category.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities in both developing and optimizing language models (1.B.1) and implementing data pipelines for large datasets (1.B.3). It also includes tasks related to software development and integration (1.A.1) by designing technical solutions for digital products. The emphasis on 'taalmodellen' (language models) points towards Generative AI. While there's a strong data engineering component, the core focus on language model development and integration into products, alongside software engineering tasks, aligns best with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile. The role requires a balanced mix of AI specialization (GenAI) and core software engineering.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly stating responsibilities that map directly to the coding book's categories. The distinction between language model development and data pipeline implementation is clear, as is the integration into digital products. The language used is precise, leaving little room for ambiguity.
